channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pot hole adjacent access chamber in road, 23rd December
item.description:
Pothole adjacent access chamber in road heading towards Stroud
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge has been trashed due to heavy traffic in village caused by A40 closure . It needs reversing and a lot of road debris needs removing . It also needs new chevrons to direct traffic off it( old ones broken) Village also needs more “ 20 is plenty “ signage as speeding has become a real issue, 23rd December
item.description:
The problems is outside 13 Whittington extending to the corner of number 12 Wittington . The debris constantly blocks the drain on the corner causing the road to flood. The area is now a complete mess . The closure of the A40 has been a blight on the village

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hole in road, on left hand edging going towards Badgeworth Road, opposite entrance to Elm Farm entrance, 23rd December
item.description:
As above
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole repair is broken, 23rd December
item.description:
A pothole was repaired last week on Bethesda Street, but the repair has failed already. The tarmac is coming loose and there is a large hole reforming.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Commercial Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incompetent workmen and council, 23rd December
item.description:
Incompetent workmen decided to switch off all of the traffic lights for about 30 minutes. So, why did the council not open up the bus gate to allow through traffic? Why do we have complete imbeciles in charge of our highways, overzealous people who want to control everything with traffic lights instead of using common sense. Get a bloody grip you morons. Also what a ridiculous place for a KFC again what incompetent moron makes these decisions?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beamont Walk, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
